name: Light and Shadow: The Movie: The Making Of: The Game
name_original: Light and Shadow: The Movie: The Making Of: The Game
description:
You're the cameraman on the set of Hollywood's biggest new '80s buddy-cop action movie: Light and Shadow.

It's time to film the big action set piece! Keep your subjects in frame and don't waste film; the director has a short fuse.

Made in 47 hours (damn you, daylight savings) for Lux Jam 2020. 

Development was recorded, and a video will be posted on Youtube as soon as it can be edited down. The link will be edited into this description.

CONTROLS:
MOUSE to aim your camera.
Hold LEFT CLICK to record.
